name: Crazy Dices 🤪🎲
description:
Game :

Game made for GMTK game jam 2022 in 48 hours with the theme "Roll of the dice".

Instructions :

- Define the settings for next dice by moving sliders.
- Create a dice anywhere you want (except red area).
- Reach the green chip.

If you are stuck you can restart the level by pressing "R".

Credits : Music :

"Moose" by https://www.bensound.com

Sounds :
